description: This file is the main source code for a Flutter mobile calculator application implementing a modern UI with custom theming, a calculator display, keypad, and calculator logic.

classes.name: OceanPalette
classes.description: Defines the color palette for the Ocean Professional theme, including primary, secondary, error, background, surface, text, and subtleBlue colors.

classes.name: CalculatorApp
classes.description: Main StatelessWidget that sets up MaterialApp with custom theme and home page.

classes.name: CalculatorHomePage
classes.description: StatefulWidget representing the main calculator UI with display and keypad.

classes.name: _CalculatorHomePageState
classes.description: State class containing calculator logic, display state, and UI building methods.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Widget displaying the header section with the title and accent underline.

classes.name: _DisplayPanel
classes.description: Widget showing the calculation display with animated number and operator indicator.

classes.name: _Keypad
classes.description: Widget organizing calculator buttons in a grid layout.

classes.name: _CalcButtonSpec
classes.description: Data class specifying button label, icon, type, tap handler, flex, and accent color.

classes.name: _CalcButton
classes.description: Widget representing an individual calculator button with modern styling and interactive feedback.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point function that runs the CalculatorApp.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Builds the custom ThemeData using the OceanPalette colors.

methods.name: onInput
methods.description: Handles input of digits and decimal point.

methods.name: onEquals
methods.description: Computes and displays the result of the current expression.

methods.name: onClear
methods.description: Resets the calculator to initial state.

methods.name: onBackspace
methods.description: Removes the last digit or sign from the display.

methods.name: onToggleSign
methods.description: Changes the sign of the current display number.

methods.name: _calculate
methods.description: Performs the arithmetic operation for two operands based on the operator.
